Articles.Content:
So there is no resource transfer? atleast ive not been able to find a way.

is there a way ?

if not WHEN WILL THERE BE A WAY

ive spent the last 5 hours designing and refining a space shuttle to realise that without fuel transfer its useless

Edited February 25, 2023 by tillyd

There is, but it's hidden. In the apps bar (where you select things like the Engineering report), the right most button brings up additional options, one of which is a Transfer Manager.

It works, but I prefer the KSP1 way. I suppose the main advantage is not needing to know to hold a key while clicking to select multiple tanks, but otherwise, it's less discoverable, and it's more difficult to know which tank is which.
